item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔呼吁欧盟加强对绿色钢铁的支持
item.description: 安赛乐米塔尔公司周四呼吁欧盟加强贸易保护，增加对绿色投资的支持，因为高成本和廉价的中国进口产品威胁着欧盟的钢铁行业。【原文：ArcelorMittal on Thursday called on the European Union to tighten trade protections and increase support for green investments, as high costs and cheap Chinese imports threaten the bloc's steel industry.】

item.title: Roblox 预测疲软，股价下跌，游戏业黯然失色
item.description: 周四，Roblox 预测的年度预订额低于市场预期，引发了市场对该电子游戏平台在多年高速发展后增长放缓的担忧，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 26%。【原文：Roblox forecast annual bookings below market estimates on Thursday, sparking fears growth at the videogame platform was slowing after years of breakneck progress, sending its shares down 26% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 拉尔夫-劳伦上调年度收入预期，原因是服装需求强劲
item.description: 拉尔夫-劳伦（Ralph Lauren）周四上调了年度营收预期，希望有更多年轻顾客购买其春季系列连衣裙、紧身袖口长裤和碎花晚宴夹克。【原文：Ralph Lauren raised its annual revenue forecast on Thursday, betting on more younger shoppers picking up its spring collection of dresses, skinny cuffed trousers and floral dinner jackets.】

item.title: 华纳音乐通过 Tempo 协议获得布鲁诺-马尔斯和阿黛尔歌曲的版权
item.description: 华纳音乐集团（Warner Music Group）周四表示，已收购 Tempo Music 的控股权，通过获得布鲁诺-马尔斯（Bruno Mars）、阿黛尔（Adele）和维兹-哈利法（Wiz Khalifa）等艺人的歌曲版权，帮助其扩大知识产权组合。【原文：Warner Music Group said on Thursday it has acquired a controlling stake in Tempo Music, helping it expand its intellectual property portfolio by gaining rights for songs by artists such as Bruno Mars, Adele and Wiz Khalifa.】

item.title: 特朗普削减援助危及新兴市场投资现金
item.description: 投资者说，美国决定冻结并可能撤销其核心援助机构，这使接受其资金的国家感到震惊，并可能使新兴经济体更难吸引私人现金。【原文：The United States' decision to freeze and potentially scrap its core aid agency jolted countries receiving its funding and could make it harder for emerging economies to attract private cash, investors said.】

item.title: 甲骨文为财务软件增加人工智能定价功能
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle）周四为其企业财务软件产品之一NetSuite增加了另一套人工智能（AI）工具，其中一些工具可以让消费者更快地获得定制自行车等商品的报价。【原文：Oracle on Thursday added another set of artificial intelligence (AI) tools to NetSuite, one of its corporate finance software offerings, including some that might make it faster for consumers to get a price quote on purchases like custom bicycles.】

item.title: 菲利普莫里斯国际公司因 ZYN 需求强劲而盈利超出预期
item.description: 卷烟生产商菲利普莫里斯国际公司（Philip Morris International）公布的第四季度业绩好于预期，原因是对 ZYN 尼古丁袋等吸烟替代品的需求强劲，这使其股价在周四上涨了近 8%。【原文：Cigarette maker Philip Morris International posted better-than-expected fourth quarter results, driven by strong demand for its smoking alternatives such as ZYN nicotine pouches, sending its shares up nearly 8% on Thursday.】

item.title: 好时预测 2025 年利润低于预期，原因是可可价格上涨
item.description: 由于创纪录的可可价格影响了 Kit Kat 生产商的利润率，好时公司周四预计全年利润将低于华尔街预期。【原文：Hershey forecast annual profit below Wall Street estimates on Thursday as record cocoa prices weigh on the Kit Kat maker's margins.】

item.title: 博格华纳预测全年收入和利润低于预期
item.description: 汽车零部件供应商博格华纳（BorgWarner）周四预计，2025 年全年收入和利润将低于华尔街预期，原因是预期汽车产量下降和美元走强。【原文：Auto parts supplier BorgWarner forecast full-year 2025 revenue and profit below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, on expectations of lower automobile production and a strong U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 英国央行下调利率，原因是经济增长疲软、通胀飙升
item.description: 英国央行周四下调了利率，因为它将今年的经济增长预期减半，并表示通胀率的跃升将被证明是暂时的，同时有两位官员出人意料地投票支持大幅降息。【原文：The Bank of England cut interest rates on Thursday as it halved its growth outlook for this year and said a jump in inflation will prove temporary, while two officials unexpectedly voted for an outsized rate cut.】

item.title: Tapestry 因 Tabby 手袋需求强劲而上调年度预期，股价飙升
item.description: 受欧洲、北美和中国市场对高价 Tabby 手袋和麂皮靴子的强劲需求推动，Tapestry 周四上调了年度销售额和利润预期，股价在盘前交易中大涨 16%。【原文：Tapestry on Thursday raised its annual sales and profit forecast, driven by strong demand for its pricey Tabby bags and suede boots across Europe, North America and China, sending its shares surging 16% in premarket trading.】

item.title: Peloton 上调 2025 年核心利润预期，原因是削减成本和推动订阅取得成效
item.description: 互联健身公司Peloton Interactive周四上调了2025财年的核心利润预期，原因是削减了成本并推出了基于应用程序的订阅服务，这使得该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨了10%。【原文：Connected fitness firm Peloton Interactive raised its core profit forecast for fiscal year 2025 on Thursday, on the back of cost cuts and push-in app-based subscription services, sending shares of the company up 10% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 空气化工产品公司在代价高昂的董事会争斗中实现超预期季度利润
item.description: 工业气体生产商空气化工产品公司（Air Products）周四公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要市场销售额的增长帮助抵消了一场代价高昂的董事会斗争。【原文：Industrial gases manufacturer Air Products beat Wall Street's expectations for first quarter profit on Thursday, as higher sales in key markets helped offset an expensive boardroom battle.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所母公司 ICE 因交易量强劲而利润增长
item.description: 洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange）周四公布第四季度利润增长，原因是纽约证券交易所母公司受益于能源和期权部门的强劲交易量。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange reported a higher fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as the New York Stock Exchange parent benefited from strong trading volumes in the energy and options segments.】

item.title: TPG 拟以 22 亿美元收购太阳能公司 Altus Power
item.description: 收购公司 TPG 旗下的气候投资部门周四表示，将以 22 亿美元的全现金交易收购 Altus Power。【原文：Buyout firm TPG's climate investment arm will acquire Altus Power for $2.2 billion in an all-cash transaction, the provider of solar power to commercial property owners and residential homes said on Thursday.】

item.title: Xcel 能源公司因电费上调而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 本周四，Xcel Energy 公布第四季度利润增长，原因是该公用事业公司受益于较高的电价和较低的运营费用。【原文：Xcel Energy reported an increase in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as the utility firm benefited from higher electricity rates and lower operating expenses.】

item.title: 隐形眼镜制造商博士伦排除私有化交易的可能性
item.description: 该隐形眼镜生产商周四表示，博士伦目前不会被私有化。【原文：Bausch + Lomb will not be taken private at this time, the contact lens maker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔首席财务官表示，不会在美国加征关税前先发制人地运输钢铁
item.description: 全球第二大钢铁制造商安赛乐米塔尔集团财务总监热努伊诺-克里斯蒂诺（Genuino Christino）表示，该集团并未增加运往美国的钢材数量，以应对唐纳德-特朗普总统可能征收的关税。【原文：ArcelorMittal , the world's second largest steelmaker, has not increased steel shipments into the United States to get ahead of President Donald Trump's potential tariffs, the group's finance chief Genuino Christino said.】

item.title: 产量增加，康菲石油公司季度利润超出预期
item.description: 康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）周四公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是产量增加抵消了实现价格下降的影响。【原文：ConocoPhillips beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as higher production offset lower realized prices.】

item.title: 百时美施贵宝预计 2025 财年营收低于预期
item.description: 百时美施贵宝公司（Bristol Myers Squibb）周四公布的第四季度盈利好于预期，但表示由于一些老药面临仿制药竞争，2025 年收入的下降幅度将超过华尔街的预测。【原文：Bristol Myers Squibb on Thursday posted better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings, but said its 2025 revenue would fall more sharply than Wall Street had forecast due to generic competition for some of its older drugs.】

item.title: Under Armour上调年度利润预期
item.description: Under Armour 周四上调了对年度利润的预期，原因是这家运动服装制造商努力减少折扣，加上产品和运费成本下降，从而提高了利润率。【原文：Under Armour on Thursday raised its forecast for annual profit, as the athletic wear maker's efforts to dial down on discounts coupled with easing product and freight costs bolstered its margins.】

item.title: 英国央行下调利率，认为通胀上升而增长疲软
item.description: 戴维-米利肯和安迪-布鲁斯【原文：By David Milliken and Andy Bruce】

item.title: 由于诊断检测需求旺盛，Labcorp 预测 2025 年收入高于预期
item.description: Labcorp 周四公布第四季度业绩超预期后，预计 2025 年收入将高于华尔街预期，这主要得益于对其诊断测试的强劲需求。【原文：Labcorp forecast 2025 revenue above Wall Street estimates after reporting fourth-quarter results beat on Thursday, banking on robust demand for its diagnostic tests.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司表示不会向 Northvolt 公司支付电池合资企业的股份
item.description: 据沃尔沃汽车公司周四发布的季度报告称，沃尔沃汽车公司将不会向 Northvolt 公司支付任何款项，以换取该公司同意收购的其电池合资企业 Novo Energy 公司 50% 的股份。【原文：Volvo Cars will not pay Northvolt any money for its 50% stake in their battery venture Novo Energy that it had agreed to acquire, according to the automaker's quarterly report on Thursday.】

item.title: 加拿大鹅第三季度营收不及预期，因中国需求不振
item.description: 加拿大鹅控股公司（Canada Goose Holdings）周四未能达到华尔街对该公司季度收入的预期，表明其在主要奢侈品市场中国的销售不景气，使其在美国上市的股票在盘前交易中下跌了 6%。【原文：Canada Goose Holdings , missed Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, signaling choppy sales in key luxury goods market China and sending its U.S.-listed shares down 6% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 由于减肥药的强劲势头，礼来公司预测 2025 年利润将大大高于预期
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周四预测的年度利润将大大高于华尔街的预期，这主要得益于该公司在新市场推出了广受欢迎的糖尿病和减肥治疗产品。【原文：Eli Lilly forecast annual profit largely above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, banking on the launch of its popular diabetes and weight-loss treatments in new markets.】

item.title: 由于美元走强和咳嗽产品销售疲软，Kenvue 2025 年利润低于预期
item.description: 受美元走强以及包括泰诺和苯海拉明在内的咳嗽和感冒产品需求疲软的影响，消费者保健公司肯维周四预测 2025 年调整后利润低于华尔街预期。【原文：Consumer health company Kenvue forecast 2025 adjusted profit below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, hit by a stronger dollar and weak demand for its cough and cold products that include Tylenol and Benadryl.】

item.title: 汤森路透发布季度有机收入增长报告
item.description: 汤森路透周四公布第四季度收入增长，并发布了 2025 年有机收入增长目标，将超过 2024 年的增长率。【原文：Thomson Reuters reported on Thursday higher fourth-quarter revenue and issued 2025 organic revenue growth targets that would exceed 2024 rates.】

item.title: 美国银行融资启动交易，增强资产负债表
item.description: 美国地区性银行正利用投资者情绪好转的机会，筹集数十亿美元的资金来开展交易，并加强其资产负债表。【原文：U.S. regional banks are capitalizing on improving investor sentiment by raising billions of dollars in equity to pursue deals and beef up their balance sheets.】

item.title: 西门子医疗集团表示欢迎西门子减持股份
item.description: 西门子医疗集团（Siemens Healthineers）首席执行官周四表示，该医疗技术公司对母公司西门子减持股份的考虑持 "非常积极 "的态度。【原文：Siemens Healthineers' CEO said on Thursday that the medical-technology company had a "very positive" view on considerations by parent Siemens to reduce its stake.】
